sql.desc: 获取编码维护列表内容

sqllist.sql: select bm,mc from gl_bmwh where lx = %(lx)s order by bm

select ly,id,hsmc,zwmc,ms,dmlx,zt,czr,czsj from( select ly,id,hsmc,zwmc,ms,dmlx,zt,czr,czsj ,rownum rn from( select a.ly,a.id,a.hsmc,a.zwmc,a.ms,a.zt,b.xm as czr,a.czsj ,c.mc as dmlx from gl_hsxxb a left join gl_hydy b on a.czr = b.hydm left join gl_bmwh c on a.dmlx = c.bm and lx = '10008' where a.lb = 'dz' --响应动作 %if paras.hsmc: and a.hsmc like '%'||%(hsmc)s||'%' %endif %if paras.zwmc: and a.zwmc like '%'||%(zwmc)s||'%' %endif %if paras.dmlx: and a.dmlx = %(dmlx)s %endif %if paras.dxzt: and a.zt = %(dxzt)s %endif %if paras.dxly: and a.ly = %(dxly)s %endif order by a.hsmc ) ) where rn >= %(rn_start)s and %(rn_end)s >= rn

sql.desc: 获取未修改的响应动作

sqllist.sql: select a.id,a.hsmc,a.zwmc,a.ms,a.dmlx,a.zt from gl_hsxxb a where a.id = %(id)s

select count(1) as count from gl_hsxxb a left join gl_hydy b on a.czr = b.hydm where a.lb = 'dz' --响应动作 %if paras.hsmc: and a.hsmc like '%'||%(hsmc)s||'%' %endif %if paras.zwmc: and a.zwmc like '%'||%(zwmc)s||'%' %endif %if paras.dmlx: and a.dmlx = %(dmlx)s %endif %if paras.dxzt: and a.zt = %(dxzt)s %endif %if paras.dxly: and a.ly = %(dxly)s %endif

sql.desc: 校验中文名称是否重复

sqllist.sql: select count(1) as count from gl_hsxxb where zwmc = %(zwmc)s and lb = 'dz' --响应动作 %if paras.id: and id != %(id)s %endif
insert into gl_blob(id,lx,czr,czsj,nr) values (%(id)s,%(lx)s,%(czr)s,%(czsj)s,%(nr)s)
update gl_blob set czr = %(czr)s ,czsj = %(czsj)s,nr = %(nr)s where id = %(nr_id)s
insert into gl_hsxxb(id,hsmc,zwmc,ms,nr_id,dmlx,zt,lb,czr,czsj,ly) values(%(id)s,%(hsmc)s,%(zwmc)s,%(ms)s,%(nr_id)s,%(dmlx)s,%(zt)s,%(lb)s,%(czr)s,%(czsj)s,1)
update gl_hsxxb set hsmc = %(hsmc)s,zwmc = %(zwmc)s,ms = %(ms)s,dmlx = %(dmlx)s,czr = %(czr)s,czsj = %(czsj)s where id = %(id)s
insert into gl_crcs(id,csdm,cssm,sslb,ssid,sxh,sfkk,mrz) values (%(id)s,%(csdm)s,%(cssm)s,%(sslb)s,%(ssid)s,%(sxh)s,%(sfkk)s,%(mrz)s)

sql.desc: 获取响应动作代码对应的参数说明

sqllist.sql: select cssm as cssm_ls from gl_crcs where ssid = %(id)s and csdm = %(csdm)s
update gl_crcs set sxh = %(sxh)s, sfkk = %(sfkk)s, mrz = %(mrz)s where ssid = %(ssid)s and csdm = %(csdm)s
delete from gl_crcs where ssid = %(id)s and csdm = %(csdm)s
delete from gl_crcs where ssid = %(id)s and (${paras._and_n(paras.csdm)})
delete from gl_crcs where ssid = %(id)s
select id,csdm,cssm,sfkk,mrz,ssid from gl_crcs where 1=1 %if paras.xydz_id: and ssid = %(xydz_id)s %endif %if paras.id: and id = %(id)s %endif order by sxh
select count(1) as count from gl_crcs where ssid = %(xydz_id)s
update gl_crcs set cssm = %(cssm)s where id = %(id)s

sql.desc: 查询要删除的响应动作的中文名称

sqllist.sql: select a.zwmc from gl_hsxxb a , gl_xydzpz b where a.id = b.dzid and (${paras._or('b.dzid',paras.ids)}) group by a.zwmc

sql.desc: 查询要删除的函数信息

sqllist.sql: select a.hsmc,a.zwmc,a.ms,a.nr_id,a.zt from gl_hsxxb a where (${paras._or('a.id',paras.ids)})

sql.desc: 删除函数信息表的内容

sqllist.sql: delete from gl_hsxxb where (${paras._or('id',paras.ids)})
delete from gl_blob where (${paras._or('id',paras.nr_ids)})
delete from gl_crcs where (${paras._or('ssid',paras.ids)})

sql.desc: 获取需要启用的函数信息id

sqllist.sql: select id from gl_hsxxb where (${paras._or('id',paras.ids)}) and zt = %(zt)s
update gl_hsxxb set zt = %(zt)s where (${paras._or('id',paras.ids)})
select a.id,a.hsmc,a.zwmc,a.ms,a.nr_id,b.nr,a.dmlx,a.zt from gl_hsxxb a left join gl_blob b on a.nr_id = b.id where a.id = %(id)s

sql.desc: 查询响应动作有没有被使用

sqllist.sql: select count(1) as count from gl_xydzpz where dzid = %(dzid)s
